verses.verse: Now <S%H6583>Pashur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H564>Immer<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> was also <S%H5057>chief<s%> <S%H6496>governor<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853>that<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things.<s%>

Then <S%H6583>Pashur<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> him <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H4115>stocks<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in the <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> on the <S%H4480>morrow,<s%> <S%H4283><s%> that <S%H6583>Pashur<s%> brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H4115>stocks.<s%> Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6583>Pashur,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H4036>Magor-missabib.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>make<s%> thee a <S%H4032>terror<s%> to thyself, and to <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H157>friends:<s%> and they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> it: and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and he shall carry them <S%H1540>captive<s%> into <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and shall <S%H5221>slay<s%> them with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

Moreover I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2633>strength<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3018>labors<s%> thereof, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the precious <S%H3366>things<s%> thereof, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> which shall <S%H962>spoil<s%> them, and <S%H3947>take<s%> them, and <S%H935>carry<s%> them to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

And <S%H859>thou,<s%> <S%H6583>Pashur,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in thine <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity:<s%> and thou shalt <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> thou shalt <S%H4191>die,<s%> and shalt be <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H157>friends,<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> thou hast <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H8267>lies.<s%>

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> thou hast <S%H6601>deceived<s%> me, and I was <S%H6601>deceived:<s%> thou art <S%H2388>stronger<s%> than I, and hast <S%H3201>prevailed:<s%> I <S%H1961>am<s%> in <S%H7814>derision<s%> <S%H3605>daily,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> <S%H3932>mocketh<s%> me.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H4480>since<s%> <S%H1767><s%> I <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> I cried <S%H2199>out,<s%> I <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> and <S%H7701>spoil;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H1961>made<s%> a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> unto me, and a <S%H7047>derision,<s%> <S%H3605>daily.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of him, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> in his <S%H8034>name.<s%> But his word <S%H1961>was<s%> in mine <S%H3820>heart<s%> as a <S%H1197>burning<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> shut <S%H6113>up<s%> in my <S%H6106>bones,<s%> and I was <S%H3811>weary<s%> with <S%H3557>forbearing,<s%> and I <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> stay.

For <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1681>defaming<s%> of <S%H7227>many,<s%> <S%H4032>fear<s%> on every <S%H4480>side.<s%> <S%H5439><s%> <S%H5046>Report,<s%> say they, and we will <S%H5046>report<s%> it. <S%H3605>All<s%> my <S%H582>familiars<s%> <S%H7965><s%> <S%H8104>watched<s%> for my <S%H6761>halting,<s%> saying, <S%H194>Peradventure<s%> he will be <S%H6601>enticed,<s%> and we shall <S%H3201>prevail<s%> against him, and we shall <S%H3947>take<s%> our <S%H5360>revenge<s%> <S%H4480>on<s%> him.

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H854>with<s%> me as a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> terrible <S%H6184>one:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> my <S%H7291>persecutors<s%> shall <S%H3782>stumble,<s%> and they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3201>prevail:<s%> they shall be <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H954>ashamed;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7919>prosper:<s%> their <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H3639>confusion<s%> shall <S%H3808>never<s%> be <S%H7911>forgotten.<s%>

But, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> that <S%H974>triest<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and <S%H7200>seest<s%> the <S%H3629>reins<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart,<s%> let me <S%H7200>see<s%> thy <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> <S%H4480>on<s%> them: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee have I <S%H1540>opened<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H7379>cause.<s%>

Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> <S%H853>ye<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he hath <S%H5337>delivered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H34>poor<s%> from the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers.<s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> I was <S%H3205>born:<s%> let <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> my <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> me <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H1288>blessed.<s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> brought <S%H1319>tidings<s%> <S%H853>to<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> A <S%H2145>man<s%> <S%H1121>child<s%> is <S%H3205>born<s%> unto thee; making him very <S%H8055>glad.<s%> <S%H8055><s%>

And let <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> as the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2015>overthrew,<s%> and <S%H5162>repented<s%> <S%H3808>not:<s%> and let him <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H2201>cry<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and the <S%H8643>shouting<s%> at <S%H6256>noontide;<s%> <S%H6672><s%>

Because <S%H834><s%> he <S%H4191>slew<s%> me <S%H3808>not<s%> from the <S%H4480>womb;<s%> <S%H7358><s%> or that my <S%H517>mother<s%> might have <S%H1961>been<s%> my <S%H6913>grave,<s%> and her <S%H7358>womb<s%> to be <S%H5769>always<s%> <S%H2030>great<s%> with me.

Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> came I <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>womb<s%> <S%H7358><s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5999>labor<s%> and <S%H3015>sorrow,<s%> that my <S%H3117>days<s%> should be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> with <S%H1322>shame?<s%>
